launch a surls-> turls translation in asynchronous mode

static int gfal_srmv2_getasync(gfal_handle handle, GList* surls, GError** err){ struct srm_context context; struct srm_preparetoget_input preparetoget_input; struct srm_preparetoget_output preparetoget_output; const int size = 2048; char errbuf[size];

srm_context_init(&context, handle->endpoint_G, errbuf, size, gfal_get_verbose());

}

/**

Warning:
need a initiaed gfal_handle
Parameters:
handle : the gfal_handle initiated ( gfal_init )
surls : GList of string of the differents surls to convert
err : GError for error report
Returns:
return 0 if success else -1, check GError for more information
